articles.author: Tassia Sipahutar
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for Feb. 19, 2024 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian shares traded broadly higher amid lingering concerns over China’s economy. US markets are shut for the Presidents’ Day holiday.
articles.content:
Asian shares traded broadly higher amid lingering concerns over Chinas economy. US markets are shut for the Presidents Day holiday.
A gauge of Asia Pacific shares ticked upwards and was set to climb… [+407 chars]
